Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD; GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Statuette of a falcon
Description: Figure of a falcon which may have formed part of the lid of some funerary object (box, figure of Ptah-Sokar-Osiris, etc.,). It has a painted decoration in different colours: black for the beak and eyes, white for the face, ochre for the top of the head and reddish for the body, in imitation of the animal's plumage.
